name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】バーチャルアイドルが踊ってみた！ #かなたんしか勝たん【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [_pC9JaHyyjQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Amane Kanata talks about the live performance staging and introduces the next song.
Performance of the song 'One Last Kiss' by Utada Hikaru, covered by Amane Kanata. The setting is a virtual art gallery.

subtitles.original: というわけで、もう一人のかなたとGizaでした。
subtitles.english: And so, that was Giza with another Kanata.

subtitles.original: 今回のライブの演出は僕自身が提案、監督しているんですけども、
subtitles.english: I proposed and directed the staging for this live show,

subtitles.original: ホロライブのすごい技術により、どれも素敵に実現していただきました。
subtitles.english: and thanks to Hololive's amazing technology, it all came together beautifully.

subtitles.original: Gizaといえば、カリオペちゃん、すいちゃんの『歌ってみた』のイメージがみんなあると思うけど、
subtitles.english: When you think of Giza, everyone probably thinks of Calliope-chan and Suichan's cover,

subtitles.original: 英語を一人で頑張りましたが、どうだったかな？
subtitles.english: but I did my best with the English parts alone. How was it?

subtitles.original: 海外ニキ、Hi, Honey! どうですか？どうだった？
subtitles.english: Overseas fans, Hi Honey! How is it? How was it?

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。さて、ではそろそろ次の曲。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Well then, it's about time for the next song.

subtitles.original: ここからの3曲は、しっとりめの曲となっております。
subtitles.english: The next three songs will be more mellow.

subtitles.original: それではまず、こちらから聞いてください。
subtitles.english: First, please listen to this.

subtitles.original: One Last Kiss。
subtitles.english: One Last Kiss.

subtitles.original: 初めてのルーブルは　なんてことはなかったわ
subtitles.english: My first time at the Louvre, it wasn't anything special

subtitles.original: 私だけのモナリザ　もうとっくに出会ってたから
subtitles.english: Because I'd already met my own Mona Lisa long ago

subtitles.original: 初めてあなたを見た　あの日動き出した歯車
subtitles.english: The day I first saw you, the gears began to turn

subtitles.original: 止められない喪失の予感
subtitles.english: An unstoppable premonition of loss

subtitles.original: もういっぱいあるけど　もう一つ増やしましょう
subtitles.english: There's already so much, let's add one more

subtitles.original: Can you give me one last kiss?
subtitles.english: Can you give me one last kiss?

subtitles.original: 忘れたくないこと
subtitles.english: Things I don't want to forget

subtitles.original: Oh oh oh oh...
subtitles.english: Oh oh oh oh...

subtitles.original: 忘れたくないこと
subtitles.english: Things I don't want to forget

subtitles.original: Oh oh oh oh...
subtitles.english: Oh oh oh oh...

subtitles.original: I love you more than you'll ever know
subtitles.english: I love you more than you'll ever know

subtitles.original: 「写真は苦手なんだ」でもそんなものはいらないわ
subtitles.english: 'I'm not good at photos,' but I don't need anything like that

subtitles.original: あなたが焼きついたまま　私の心のプロジェクター
subtitles.english: With you burned into the projector of my heart

subtitles.original: 寂しくないふりしてた　まあ、そんなのお互い様か
subtitles.english: I was pretending not to be lonely, well, I guess we were both doing that

subtitles.original: 誰かを求めることは　即ち傷つくことだった
subtitles.english: Seeking someone out was synonymous with getting hurt

subtitles.original: Oh, can you give me one last kiss?
subtitles.english: Oh, can you give me one last kiss?

subtitles.original: 燃えるようなキスをしよう
subtitles.english: Let's share a burning kiss

subtitles.original: 忘れたくても　忘れられないほど
subtitles.english: So much that even if I wanted to forget, I couldn't

subtitles.original: Oh oh oh oh...
subtitles.english: Oh oh oh oh...

subtitles.original: I love you more than you'll ever know
subtitles.english: I love you more than you'll ever know

subtitles.english: I love you more than you'll ever know

subtitles.original: I love you more than you'll ever know
subtitles.english: I love you more than you'll ever know

subtitles.original: もう分かっているよ　この世の終わりでも
subtitles.english: I already know, even if it's the end of the world

subtitles.original: 年をとっても
subtitles.english: Even as I grow old

subtitles.original: 忘れられない人
subtitles.english: The person I can't forget

subtitles.original: 吹いていった風の跡を　追いかけた眩しい午後
subtitles.english: Chasing the traces of the wind that blew past, a dazzling afternoon
